guides.title: Intercept HTTP Requests
guides.description: Set up Burp Suite to intercept HTTP requests.
guides.command: Configure browser proxy to 127.0.0.1:8080 and enable Intercept in Burp Suite.
guides.explanation: Routes browser traffic through Burp Suite to inspect and modify HTTP requests.

guides.title: Spider a Website
guides.description: Crawl a website to map its structure.
guides.command: Add target to Site map, right-click, and select 'Spider this host'.
guides.explanation: Automatically discovers pages and resources on the target website.

guides.title: Perform a Vulnerability Scan
guides.description: Use Burp Scanner to identify vulnerabilities.
guides.command: Select target in Site map, go to Scanner tab, and start an active scan.
guides.explanation: Scans for common vulnerabilities like XSS or SQL injection.

guides.title: Replay Requests
guides.description: Resend HTTP requests to test modifications.
guides.command: In Proxy or History tab, select a request, and send to Repeater.
guides.explanation: Allows manual modification and resending of HTTP requests.

guides.title: Brute Force Login
guides.description: Use Intruder to brute force a login form.
guides.command: Capture login request, send to Intruder, set payload positions, and load a wordlist.
guides.explanation: Tests multiple username/password combinations against a login form.
